OUTLINE : Patients undergo baseline evaluation week 1 focusing basic demographic , health , physical function quality-of-life assessment . These assessment include Short Physical Performance Battery ( SPPB ) ; Hand Grip Test Muscular Strength ; Demographics Physical Activity History ; Functional Assessment Cancer Therapy ( FACT-Leu ) ; Distress Thermometer ; Short-form Positive Affect Schedule ( PANAS-SF ) ; Satisfaction Life Scale ( SWL ) ; FAST-23 Disability Measure ; Center Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale Short Form ( CES-D ) ; Self-efficacy Physical Activity Scale ; Intervention Feedback Form ; Pre-Post Session Ratings . Some medical data may obtain patient 's medical record assist assessment . Beginning week 2-5 , patient undergo 30-minute orientation exercise session tailor individual need ability . After completion physical activity intervention , patient complete activity packet repeat physical function quality life assessment week 5-6 upon readmission consolidation therapy week 9-13 . After completion study intervention , patient follow 4 month .
